channel.title: GRUB loading error > grub rescue
channel.description:
Hi, I need to save my system. Using :
Version 7.0.0 r153978 (Qt5.15.2)
and get sudenly this error :
``` GRUB loading. Welcome to GRUB !
error : unknown filesystem grub rescue> ```
Please support :fearful: :fearful: :fearful: Thanks
By the way, why can I not post links neither pictures ?
**Sorry, you can't embed media items in a post.**

item.title: GRUB loading error > grub rescue
item.dc:creator: happy_hollaf
item.description:
I’d like to boot my Gateway again so I can backup some files !

Please anybody, help me.

Causes of that issue are not :

  • Interrupted updates;
  • malware [less likely]
  • hardware issues

Read full topic

item.title: GRUB loading error > grub rescue
item.dc:creator: happy_hollaf
item.description:
• The system or virtual machine (VM) is no longer booting? This can be very difficult analyze and difficult to fix. Asking in support forums might not result in helpful answers. Fixing this most likely requires being an advanced user or even very advanced user.*

I need one please ! Panic mode on.

EDIT : Would a “Launch Boot-Repair” using a USB key be a possibility ? Please let me post medias like links and pictures.

Read full topic

item.title: GRUB loading error > grub rescue
item.dc:creator: happy_hollaf
item.description:
Patrick:

Retrieving data from the broken system?

If possible all the 3 proposals.

But mainly restore some files if my Gateway is lost and I can’t boot anymore…

EDIT : I’m not a boss in the linux world. I need to get my KeyPassXC back. I would like to post what I tried to do but still that message I’m not allowed to.

Read full topic

item.title: GRUB loading error > grub rescue
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Recover can mean many things. What are you attempting?

  • Make the unbootable system bootable again?
  • Get a new functional Whonix?
  • Retrieving data from the broken system?

Read full topic

item.title: GRUB loading error > grub rescue
item.dc:creator: happy_hollaf
item.description:
Hi and thank you for your answer.
Oh my godness, I won’t be able to recover my system ?!
Honestly ?

Read full topic

item.title: GRUB loading error > grub rescue
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
See:

Kicksecure – 21 Sep 22

Broken Boot

System is no longer booting?

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

Read full topic
